attributes.additional_details:
I am urging the government to ban Big Brother across the whole of the United Kingdom.

Why do we have television corporations that show and run a show with the biggest losers in modern society? We need to save the current and future generation of people who sit there and watch these untalented so called people day and night (Even watching them sleep).

There are so many great TV programs out there that are losing their ratings and are cancelled because of this program.
